      • backpropagate

        public void backpropagate(float learnEffect,
                          float[] shoulds)
                   throws CoreNetException
        Backpropagates this output layer by the learn effect epsilon. DeltaWik = E * Di * ak
        Parameters:
        learnEffect - How much to adjust the weights (0..1)
        shoulds - Output should data trainings set
        Throws:
        CoreNetException

      • fullyConnect

        public void fullyConnect(HiddenLayer hiddenLayer,

        Fully connecting this output layer with the hidden layer
        Parameters:
        hiddenLayer - Hidden layer to connect with
        generator - Generator to generate weight values

      • getOutputNeuron

        public HiddenNeuron getOutputNeuron(int id)
                             throws CoreNetException
        Getting output neuron for specific id. The id is in the range 0 to maxNeurons -1
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the output neuron
        Returns:
        Output neuron with this id
        Throws:
        CoreNetException - Index out of bounds

        Returns:
